about_the_game:
Welcome to Glimvale! ♥

Build, decorate, and grow your village in this cozy city-builder. A relaxing game where your world keeps evolving, even when you're away !

🛠️ Note: All screenshots show a WIP version, still in development. 🛠️

In Glimvale, you create your own village and ensure adventurers feel happy and relaxed as they craft items, cook delicious meals, collect mascots, and explore small dungeons.

Make your world as welcoming as possible by decorating the environment and shaping it to your liking.

Glimvale is a peaceful and relaxing management game where you watch your village flourish and fill with adventurers as you improve it. Witness Bookmark Paladins, Plaid Mages, and Knitting Thieves joyfully roam your town. ♥ Build dungeons for them to gain experience and gold, then customize and upgrade them.

☕ A Latte Café Tavern ? You got it !
🥘 Customization for every building ? Yes !
📚 Book staircases ? Absolutely !
🐴 A collection of fantastic mounts ? You bet !

What Glimvale offers:

💕 3 to 8 hours of gameplay
💕 Create and personalize your own adorable town
💕 Place small decorations to delight your adventurers
💕 Manage buildings and customize their functions
💕 Provide for the needs of your adventurers
💕 A sandbox mode—just have fun!
💕 Fun MMORPG references in a cozy setting
💕 Light idle mechanics that let your village thrive over time

Milkshake Games is a small team working on heartfelt indie games.

Four of us collaborated on Glimvale:
Alexandre (Game Developer)
Ilona (2D Artist)
Elodie (Sound Design, Music)
Gronouil (UI/UX)

Thank you !

Minimum:

  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
